Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 85 before being caught at mid-wicket
Kohli and Rahul put on 165 for the fourth wicket
Australia batted 73 balls between boundaries and hit 2 in the last 23 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins expressed disappointment about the dropped catch of Virat Kohli
Cummins acknowledged the issues with Australia's spin options
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won comfortably with 8.4 overs to spare
David Warner and Steve Smith were the top performers for Australia with scores of 41 and 46 respectively
